briefTitle: Evaluation of Breast Cancer Surgical Margins Using Optical Spectroscopy
officialTitle: A Pilot Study of Intraoperative Margin Assessment Comparing Optical Spectroscopy and Frozen Section Analysis for Ductal Carcinoma In Situ of the Breast
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The goal of this research is to develop a minimally invasive technology with the capability of rapidly assessing surgical margins for breast cancer patients undergoing breast conserving therapy.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ductal carcinoma in-situ or invasive carcinoma diagnosed by image directed core biopsy who are planning to undergo breast conserving surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* patients who were diagnosed with excisional biopsy and patients undergoing mastectomy
